title: Jonah Ray, stand-up comedian
itunes:title: Jonah Ray, stand-up comedian
description:
I had the absolute pleasure of getting to know the stand-up comedian (and Nerdist Podcast co-host) Jonah Ray a few weeks ago at his house and we were able to cover a lot of ground. We spoke of his punk rock roots, how his comedy is informed by that and how we continually define and refine our definitions of success. Brought to you in conjunction with Propertyofzack.com

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
